trans-unit.target:
Dear %firstName%,

Your application for %jobTitle% has successfully been forwarded to %companyName%. Please find attached the CV we handed in with your message.

Your message to %companyName%:

%applicationMessage%

What happens next?

%companyName% will review your application and contact you directly in case of questions. Please note that Transport Talent cannot provide information regarding your application status. All questions should be directed to %companyName%. Once the application process is finished you will be notified about the results via email.

Thank you for using Transport Talent and good luck with your application.

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent
